Class BlackboardDecorator

This decorator it's going to check a blackboard Boolean value and return Success if the bool value is true, false otherwise.

Execute()

Called when the behavior tree wants to execute this decorator. Put here all the code you want this action to execute.

Declaration
protected override ENodeState Execute()
Returns
Type Description
ENodeState

SUCCESS if this decorator has been executed successfully, RUNNING if is still executing and FAILED if the action has failed to execute it's tasks.
